definition.name: Card
definition.description: A versatile card component that serves as a container for content with a consistent visual style. It provides a rounded border, background color, and subtle shadow to create a card-like appearance.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the card container

definition.visualLayout: A rectangular container with rounded corners, a border, background color, and subtle shadow. It can contain various child components like header, content, and footer sections.

definition.name: CardHeader
definition.description: The header section of the card component. It provides a container for the card's title, description, and other header content with appropriate spacing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the header container

definition.visualLayout: A flexbox container with vertical layout and consistent spacing between elements. It includes padding and is typically used to house the card's title and description.

definition.name: CardTitle
definition.description: The title component for the card. It provides a visually prominent heading with appropriate typography styles including semi-bold weight and tight letter spacing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the title text

definition.visualLayout: A text container with semi-bold font weight and tight letter spacing, typically placed at the top of the card header to provide the main heading.

definition.name: CardDescription
definition.description: A text component designed for displaying secondary or descriptive text within a card header. It uses a muted color and smaller font size to create visual hierarchy.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the description text

examples: <CardDescription>This is a description of the card's purpose or content.</CardDescription>
definition.visualLayout: A text container with smaller font size and muted color, typically placed below the card title within the header.

definition.name: CardContent
definition.description: The main content area of the card component. It provides appropriate padding and spacing for the card's primary content.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the content container

examples: This is the main content of the card.
definition.visualLayout: A padded container within the card that holds the main content. It has padding on all sides except the top, which is removed to maintain proper spacing with the header.

definition.name: CardFooter
definition.description: The footer section of the card component. It provides a container for actions, additional information, or other content that should appear at the bottom of the card.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to be applied to the footer container

definition.visualLayout: A flexbox container at the bottom of the card with centered items and appropriate padding. It removes top padding to maintain proper spacing with the content above.
